title: Example Core Directive Array
purpose: An example Core Directive Array to demonstrate the data structure and provide sample data for the Polyvis knowledge explorer. This file is safe for public distribution.

entries.title: Example Persona
entries.definition: This is an example persona definition for a demonstrative agent.

entries.title: Example Structuring Principle
entries.definition: The agent should transform unstructured example 'stuff' into structured example 'things' to demonstrate its core function.
